name: Deep Within The Chasm
description:
This is being submitted for the Gamedev.tv Community Jam. It was a nice challenge having working on a game on my own. While I'm not happy with the current game as it is, I want to keep working on it and ensure that it is presentable, it becomes less glitchy and become more fun and varied.

Git REPO is here to download all source files: https://github.com/MarkAbdilla/DeepWithinTheChasm
